0.Description: There's really nothing here. The area is brightly but not harshly lighted. The air is completely still and of a comfortable temperature.

StoryTexts.Text:
You appear in a completely white, unbounded space.

A female voice which seems to come from everywhere speaks:
"Welcome, @Character-name@; this is the construct. It's my loading program. We can load anything from clothing to equipment, weapons, training simulations... anything we need."

A simple WOODEN DOOR appears to your right.

Portals.Description: An unassuming wooden door with a metal handle. It looks like it will lead to a closet.
Portals.AccessText: You turn the knob and pull the door open. As you do, the door vanishes and the world briefly dematerializes around you....

Closet.Description: This room is nothing like the white void. It's cold, cramped, and a little stale.

StoryTexts.Text:
You appear in a modest closet with a wood floor and a single incandescent bulb hanging from the ceiling which glows dimly.

On the shelf before you you see a BOOK.

Behind you is the DOOR out.

Portals.Description: A simple wooden door. You believe it will lead back out to the construct.
Portals.AccessText: You turn the knob and pull the door open. As you do, the door vanishes as the world briefly dematerializes around you....

closet-book.Description: The book has an old leather hardcover embossed with ornate letters. "Cloud Atlas by David Mitchell"
